title: Analytics and Insights Agency | Expert Services & Consulting
content:
# Analytics and Insights Agency | Expert Services & Consulting

Experienced marketing analytics agency that helps you make data-driven business decisions to drive profitability and ROI. Unlock actionable insights from your data with our analytics & insights services.


Back To Services Analytics & Insights Services Overview Take accurate, better and timely decisions with data-driven insights for improved digital experiences. Data speaks louder than words, but the only catch is in the art of listening! Analytics and insights play a vital role in building, running, optimizing, and scaling your marketing efforts and overall digital brand presence. With 20+ years of experience and global exposure in strategizing data-driven marketing campaigns, we not only understand data but also know how to translate it into actionable insights that drive seamless digital experiences and business success. Trusted by leading brands: Schedule a Call Our Services Let's Get Started Brand Discovery The discovery includes collecting and devising business insights and understanding how your brand is searched on the digital landscape. User Aquisition We peek into the user journey to get metrics on visitors, sessions, impressions, and more for a better understanding of the acquisition cost. Conversion This is the part where data like conversions, cart abandonment, average order value, and ROAS are measured for improving performance. Customer Retention Via user and brand data, devising a strategy that reflects in the campaign performance through reduced churn rate and improved ROI. Customer Loyalty By translating the data, we create actionable insights that help with brand advocacy and reflect in increased CLTV & AOV. Marketing Intelligence Empowering customer-centric brands with advanced digital tracking and unified analytics to foster personalized shopping experiences across channels. Better Data For Smarter Decisions Effective Promotions, Better ROI Personalized 1-1 Marketing at Scale Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Tools We Use We are a preferred Marketing Analytics agency for digital brands with prowess over leading data analytics and automation tools. Choose one or let us discover one that fits your analytics needs! Supercharge your campaigns with the best tools, and Krish as your Analytics and Insights partner for exceptional experiences and personalized marketing. Our work in action B2C UAE Consumer Goods 'Clocking' stellar success for CASIO with data-driven digital marketing View Case Study B2C North America Fashion and Apparel Helping take 'XL' strides to success for USA's leading footwear business View Case Study B2C Digital Marketing Amplifying success for USA's adventure giant with data-driven marketing View Case Study B2C Digital Marketing Flowing towards enhanced brand visibility with strategic digital marketing View Case Study Frequently Asked Questions How can data analytics improve marketing strategy? Data Analytics provides real-time updates on consumer preferences, buying behavior, revenue patterns, and much more. With these insights, we can chalk out a marketing strategy that is data-driven and backed with concrete business information. How can Krish help digital stores with data and analytical strategies? We are a team of digital analytics consulting experts with an extensive experience of more than 20 years. Our digital marketers hold global experience in successfully running data-driven digital marketing campaigns. With Krish by your side, you can expect tailored data and marketing analytics services that work for your overall brand experience (BX) and success. What are the advantages of marketing analytics? Better segmentation for CX-oriented marketing, insights into cost acquisitions, marketing budget allocation, user behavior analysis, trend analysis, and campaign optimization are just a few of the benefits that marketing analytics offers. Trusted by leading brands
